caller_intent: Brandy needed assistance retrieving applications for recently issued policies (auto, home, and umbrella) to send them for electronic signatures, as she encountered an error during the process.
resolution_steps: Karen confirmed Brandy was logged into Pin Connect and guided her to access the policy via Penn Plus.
Karen instructed Brandy to navigate to the 'reports' tab and use the 'manage e-signature' feature to send applications for signatures.
Karen clarified that the umbrella policy required manual input via the 'deck page' since it didn't automatically download into the system.
Brandy confirmed she completed the process for all policies and thanked Karen.
knowledge_required: Understanding of Penn Plus and Pin Connect systems
Workflow for retrieving and sending policy applications for e-signature
Differentiation between policy types (auto, home, umbrella) and their processing behaviors
summary: Brandy from Alliance Insurance sought help retrieving applications for recently issued policies after encountering an error. Karen guided her through accessing the policies in Penn Plus, using the e-signature feature, and manually handling the umbrella policy. Brandy successfully completed the process and confirmed she had all necessary information.
